message: Happy birthday to you my only love, my Nica. Thank you for coming in to my life. I'm so happy to have you. Kani nga app daghan kaynig quotes, enjoy reading this.

From the moment I saw you,
From the moment I looked into your eyes.
There was something about you I knew, I knew.
That you were once in a lifetime,
A treasure near impossible to find.
I know how lucky I am to have you. - Jim Brickman
The darkest nights produce the brightest stars.
Every adversity carries with it the seed of an equal or greater benefit. - Napoleon Hill
Your presence graces this moment with an enchanting serendipity, as if fate itself orchestrated our meeting at this perfect intersection of time and space.
The battles you fight may be invisible, but the scars they leave tell a story of resilience and unwavering spirit.

Deep inside of me is you
You give life to what I do
Your heart is a melody of kindness, playing a tune that uplifts everyone around you, making the world a more harmonious place.
Your infectious laughter brightens the days of everyone around you, making the world a little more joyful.
You create a warm and welcoming space for everyone you meet, making the world feel less lonely.

Holding you in my arms
No one else's fit so perfectly
I could dance forever with you, with you - Jim Brickman
You are stronger than you know. More capable than you ever dreamed. And you are loved more than you could possibly imagine.
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful. - Albert Schweitzer
The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it. - Unknown

You can go higher
You can go deeper
There are no boundaries
Above and beneath you
Break every rule cause there's nothing between you and your dreams

Nagtatanong ang isip, 'di raw maintindihan
Kung ano ang nararamdaman
Dapat mong malaman, sa puso ko'y ikaw lamang
Ang nag-iisa
In your eyes, I found my home, and in your heart, I found my love.

Kung ikaw ay mawala sa piling ko
'Di na alam kung kakayanin pa kayang umibig pang muli
Kahit na ano pa'ng mangyayari, 'di maaring ipagpalit
Sasamahan pa kita hanggang sa huli
Love took me by the hand and led me to you, where I found my forever.
Falling in love with you was the easiest and most wonderful thing I've ever done.
You're not just my love, my Nica, you're my reason to believe in magic.
Sometimes the bad things that happen in our lives put us directly on the path to the best things that will ever happen to us.
Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it. - Charles R. Swindoll
Thankful jd kay ko nga na meet tika, I love you. Happy kay ko sa tanan na butang na imo gihatag nako.
My love for you knows no bounds, my Nica, it's as vast as the universe and as timeless as eternity

Then you smiled over your shoulder
For a minute, I was stone-cold sober
I pulled you closer to my chest
You're still the one that I love, the only one I dream of.

I may not have much to show
No diamonds that glow
No limousines to take you where you go
But if you ever find yourself
Tired of all the games you play
When the world seems so unfair
You can count on me to stay
Life may be hard, but remember you're not alone. My hand is always yours to hold, and together we'll face whatever comes.

Di maikukumpara
Araw-araw kong dala-dala
Paboritong panalangin ko'y
Makasama ka sa pagtanda
Ang hiling sa Diyos na may gawa
Apelyido ko'y maging iyo
The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts. - Marcus Aurelius

I am amazed
When I look at you
I see you smiling back at me
It's like all my dreams come true

I am afraid
If I lost you girl
I'd fall through the cracks
And lose my track in this crazy lonely world

Sometimes it's so hard to believe
When the nights can be so long
And faith gave me the strength
And kept me holding on

You are the love of my life
And I'm so glad you found me
You are the love of my life
Baby put your arms around me
I guess this is how it feels
When you finally find something real
My angel in the night
You are my love
The love of my life

Now here you are
With midnight closing in
You take my hand as our shadows dance
With moonlight on your skin

I look in your eyes
I'm lost inside your kiss
I think if I'd never met you
About all the things i'd missed

Sabik nang mahalikan
Mayakap ka't masayaw sa ulan
Ang mundo'y gagaan
Mundo ko'y gagaan
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today. - Franklin D. Roosevelt

You are the air I need to breathe
The river of life inside of me
You are the half that made me whole
You are the anchor of my soul
Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success. - Shiv Khera

Cause my love is mine, all mine
I love mine, mine, mine
Nothing in the world belongs to me
But my love mine, all mine
Nothing in the world is mine for free
But my love mine, all mine, all mine

You the reason I believe that love is real
Ain't nobody make me feel the way you make me feel
Every love story is beautiful, but ours is my favorite, because it's with you.
I didn't plan on falling in love with you, but I'm so glad I did.
In your arms, I found my sanctuary, and in your love, I found my eternity.
With each beat of my heart, I fall deeper in love with you, my Nica.

You are my shelter from the storm
You are the road that leads me home
And baby, with you here face to face
Oh, I know I've found my place
Believe you can and you're halfway there. - Theodore Roosevelt
Every moment with you feels like a beautiful dream I never want to wake up from.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream. - C.S. Lewis

I found a love, for me
Darling, just dive right in and follow my lead
Well, I found a girl, beautiful and sweet
Oh, I never knew you were the someone waiting for me

I bought you things that I didn't even have the money for
If I could make you feel so rich, I don't mind feeling poor
There's something 'bout you so addictive, had me needing more
Yeah, I just wanna hold you
Baby, you the one I want
Discovering you feels like stumbling upon a treasure in the depths of my existence, a profound moment that forever changed the course of my heart.
Though the mysteries of tomorrow remain veiled, one certainty shines brightly: my unwavering presence beside you, a promise forged in the depths of my soul.
Falling in love with you is the best adventure I've ever embarked upon.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop. - Confucius

Not anyone, you're the one
More than fun, you're the sanctuary
Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise. - Victor Hugo
Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever. - Mahatma Gandhi

If you've been waiting for fallin' in love
Babe, you don't have to wait on me
'Cause I've been aiming for heaven above
But an angel ain't what I need
Pull me, oh, so close
'Cause you never know
Just how long our lives will be

Cause all of the small things that you do
Are what remind me why I fell for you
And when we're apart, and I'm missing you
I close my eyes and all I see is you
And the small things you do - New West

Once in every life
You find the one that's right
And when you say forever it's true
That's the love I found in you

Wishing you godspeed, glory
There will be mountains you won't move
You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. - A.A. Milne

Take a little time, baby
See the butterflies' colors
Listen to the birds that were sent
To sing for me and you
Can you feel me?
This is such a wonderful place to be

Even if there is pain now
Everything would be alright
For as long as the world still turns
There will be night and day
Can you hear me?
There's a rainbow always after the rain
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop. - Confucius
This too shall pass.
With you, my Nica, every moment is a masterpiece painted with the colors of love.
You possess an unshakeable strength that inspires me, my love. With you by my side, I believe every day will be better, and together, we can conquer anything.
My love for you grows stronger with each passing day. I promise to always cherish and protect our bond.
You are my rock, my safe haven in this chaotic world. I promise to stand by your side through every storm and celebrate every triumph together.
No matter how you feel, get up, dress up, show up, and never give up.
Your smile is my favorite sight, and your laughter is my favorite sound. I promise to do everything in my power to keep joy in your heart.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do. - Steve Jobs
You are the most precious gift I've ever received, and I vow to treasure you for eternity.
In your arms, I find solace and warmth. I promise to hold you close and never let go, for you are my home.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. - Eleanor Roosevelt
The purpose of our lives is to be happy. - Dalai Lama
Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself. - George Bernard Shaw
No distance can ever diminish my love for you. I promise to bridge any gap between us with unwavering devotion and commitment.
You are my best friend, my confidant, and my greatest love. I promise to support you in all your endeavors and encourage you to reach for the stars.
It's okay to not be okay, but it's not okay to give up. You've got this.
With you, I've found a love so pure and true. I promise to be faithful and loyal, honoring our connection with honesty and integrity.
The sun himself is weak when he first rises, and gathers strength and courage as the day gets on.
Every heartbeat reminds me of the love we share. I promise to love you fiercely and passionately, now and forever.
Believe you can and you're halfway there. - Theodore Roosevelt
The only way out is through. - Robert Frost

With every step you climb another mountain
Every breath it's harder to believe
You'll make it through the pain
Weather the hurricanes
To get to that one thing
Tough times never last, but tough people do. - Robert H. Schuller

Ikaw at ako pinag-isa
Tayong dalwa may kanya kanya
Sa isa't-isa tayo ay sumasandal
Bawat hangad kayang abutin
Sa pangamba'y di paaalipin
Basta't ikaw ako tayo magpakailanman
The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary. - Vidal Sassoon
Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm. - Winston Churchill
Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going. - Sam Levenson
The pain you feel today is the strength you feel tomorrow. For every challenge encountered, there is opportunity for growth.

Ikaw ay anghel na napadpad sa impyerno
Ako ang demonyong gagabay sa iyo
Pabalik sa langit habang tayo ay paakyat
Ako'y napa-ibig sa 'yo

Your eyes, two celestial maps, chart the course of my heart's journey. Though adrift, I discover uncharted islands of joy nestled within your guileless smile. Happiness giggles like a hidden brook, beckoning me to explore and chase its melody.

The light in your smile draws me in, reflecting everything I find beautiful and inspiring about you. Your smile isn't just a gift to you, it's a beacon of joy that spills over and illuminates the world around us, including me.
You are my love, my Nica. You are my everything. Everyday ganahan rajud ko to be by your side.
Unsa paman ako ma say I love, love, love you.
